data.name: Unblocking
data.detailed_description:
Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards.
It supports 3 game modes:

  • Puzzle (multiple levels to complete by clearing all blocks on the boards)
  • Relax (time based mode which extends its countdown based on the number of lines completed)
  • Arcade (make lines of different colors using all the available pieces before the time runs out in order to avoid the loss of lifes)
data.about_the_game:
Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards.
It supports 3 game modes:

  • Puzzle (multiple levels to complete by clearing all blocks on the boards)
  • Relax (time based mode which extends its countdown based on the number of lines completed)
  • Arcade (make lines of different colors using all the available pieces before the time runs out in order to avoid the loss of lifes)
data.short_description: Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards. It supports 3 game modes: Puzzle (multiple levels), Relax (time limit mode) and Arcade (lifes based mode)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit processor and operating system required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit processor and operating system required
